SEARCH
Package game.body.walkers

Class WalkerFrame

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
city.cs.engine.Walker
game.body.walkers.WalkerFrame
Direct Known Subclasses:
MobWalker, PlayerWalker
public abstract class WalkerFrame extends city.cs.engine.Walker
An Abstract class used for all walkers in the game. The WalkerFrame class is a class which extends the Walker class and is used to create the base for all walkers in the game. All Walkers in the game will extend this class and will have the same basic functionality at their core, such as the ability to attack, take damage, die, etc. This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated as it is only used as a base class for all walkers in the game.
Since:
13-02-2025
Author:
Alexander Smolowitz, alexander.smolowitz@city.ac.uk
See Also:

  • PlayerWalker

      public void constructSolidFixture(city.cs.engine.Shape shape)
      Constructs a solid fixture for the walker, then adds the shape to the solid fixtures array to be used later if the need for reconstruction arises.

    • toggleOnAttack

      public void toggleOnAttack()
      sets the walker's state to the attack state.
      See Also:
      • State

    • toggleOffAttack

      public void toggleOffAttack()
      sets the walker's state to the idle state if still in attack state. stops the sound effect of the attack.
      See Also:
      • State
      • SoundFX

    • toggleOnHit

      public void toggleOnHit()
      sets the walker's state to the hit state. starts a timer to call toggleOffHit() and start the sound effect for hit after 300 ms.
      See Also:
      • State
      • SoundFX

    • toggleOffHit

      public void toggleOffHit()
      sets the walker's state to the idle state if not the dead
      See Also:
      • State
      • SoundFX

    • toggleActionCoolDown

      public void toggleActionCoolDown()
      Puts the walker's actions on cooldown starts a timer to turn the cooldown off after 1500 ms.
      See Also:
      • State
      • SoundFX

    • die

      public void die()
      Destroys the walker after stoping all sound effects. This method is called when the walker dies.
      See Also:
      • SoundFX

    • makeGhostly

      public void makeGhostly()
      Destroys all fixtures attached to the walker, constructs Ghostly fixtures for all shapes in the solid fixtures array and the ghostly fixtures array. Sets gravity scale to 0 to prevent falling through the floor. Sets linear y velocity to 0 to prevent floating up or down. Outputs a warning if the walker is already ghostly.

    • makeSolid

      public void makeSolid()
      Destroys all fixtures attached to the walker, constructs solid fixtures for all shapes in the solid fixtures array, constructs ghostly fixtures for all the shapes in the ghostly fixtures array. Sets gravity scale to 1 to resume normal gravity. Outputs a warning if the walker is already solid.

    • beginDeath

      public void beginDeath()
      Sets the walker to the DEATH state. Calls makeGhostly() to make the walker ghostly.

    • setState

      public void setState(State state)
      Sets the state of the walker to the given state.
      Parameters:
      state - The state to set the walker to.

    • setDirection

      public void setDirection(Direction direction)
      Sets the direction of the walker to the given direction.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to set the walker to.
